articles.author: Jacob Wendler
articles.title: Zelenskyy says Ukraine won’t cede territory to Russia - Politico
articles.description: The Ukrainian president ruled out territorial concessions amid talks with European leaders in London.
articles.content: The first draft of that framework drew skepticism from Ukrainian and European leaders as well as bipartisan lawmakers in the U.S. after a leaked draft echoed several key Russian demands, including th… [+1104 chars]
